Module simpletimeapi
Package simpletimeapi

Interface Duration

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Duration>
public interface Duration extends Comparable<Duration>
Length between two Times. Hint to implementer: A Duration is allowed to be negative.
Author:
Richard van den Ham r.vandenham@fontys.nl, Pieter van den Hombergh p.vandenhombergh@fontys.nl

  • Method Details

    • plus

      Duration plus(Duration duration)
      Adds a duration. Adds a Duration to this Duration and returns new Duration object.
      Parameters:
      duration - The Duration to add.
      Returns:
      a new Duration object.

    • getHours

      int getHours()
      Just a getter. For a duration of 2:45, it returns 2.
      Returns:
      the amount of hours in this duration.

    • getMinutes

      int getMinutes()
      Just a getter. For a duration of 1:45, it returns 45.
      Returns:
      the amount of minutes in this duration.

    • asMinutes

      int asMinutes()
      Get this duration as a number of minutes. For a duration of 1:45, it returns 60+45=105.
      Returns:
      minutes

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns textual representation of Duration.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Duration in minutes written as e.g "300 minutes".

    • equals

      boolean equals(Object other)
      Equals method. Hint: generate equals method together with hashCode.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      other - object
      Returns:
      true if the value of this Duration is equal to the value of other Duration.
